languages.text: Грядут великие испытания, и их надлежит встретить во всеоружии. Вольный Торговец заключит договор о взаимопомощи с квесторами Департаменто Муниторум, и под надзором этих выдающихся теоретиков войны мануфакторумы планеты будут перестроены для производства оружия и военной экипировки. В челюстях токарных станков и чревах легировочных чанов бездушная пласталь обретет свою высшую и самую совершенную форму — форму оружия.

traits.locale_text: Заключить союз с Муниторумом, чтобы они помогли перевести производство Кьявы на военные рельсы.

languages.text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.
languages.original_text: Грядут великие испытания, и их надлежит встретить во всеоружии. Вольный Торговец заключит договор о взаимопомощи с квесторами Департаменто Муниторум, и под надзором этих выдающихся теоретиков войны мануфакторумы планеты будут перестроены для производства оружия и военной экипировки. В челюстях токарных станков и чревах легировочных чанов бездушная пласталь обретет свою высшую и самую совершенную форму — форму оружия.

traits.locale_text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloying vats, soulless plasteel will take its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloying vats, soulless plasteel will take its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

languages.text: Nos esperan grandes pruebas y debemos prepararnos para hacerles frente. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente firmará un acuerdo de ayuda mutua con los cuestores del Departmento Munitorum. Estos brillantes teóricos de la guerra supervisarán la reasignación de los manufactorums del planeta para que produzcan armas y equipo militar. En las fauces de los tornos mecánicos y en los úteros de las cubas de aleaciones, el plastiacero desalmado cobrará su forma más perfecta: la de un arma.
languages.original_text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

traits.locale_text: Nos esperan grandes pruebas y debemos prepararnos para hacerles frente. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente firmará un acuerdo de ayuda mutua con los cuestores del Departmento Munitorum. Estos brillantes teóricos de la guerra supervisarán la reasignación de los manufactorums del planeta para que produzcan armas y equipo militar. En las fauces de los tornos mecánicos y en los úteros de las cubas de aleaciones, el plastiacero desalmado cobrará su forma más perfecta: la de un arma.

languages.text: De terribles épreuves nous attendent, et nous devons nous y préparer au mieux. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} signera un accord d'assistance mutuelle avec les quaestors du Departmento Munitorum. Ces grands théoriciens de l'art de la guerre superviseront la reconversion des manufactorums de la planète en usines d'armement et d'équipement militaire. Entre les mâchoires des machines-outils et dans les entrailles des cuves d'alliage, le plastacier sans âme atteindra son expression la plus exaltée et la plus parfaite : celle d'une arme.
languages.original_text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

traits.locale_text: De terribles épreuves nous attendent, et nous devons nous y préparer au mieux. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} signera un accord d'assistance mutuelle avec les quaestors du Departmento Munitorum. Ces grands théoriciens de l'art de la guerre superviseront la reconversion des manufactorums de la planète en usines d'armement et d'équipement militaire. Entre les mâchoires des machines-outils et dans les entrailles des cuves d'alliage, le plastacier sans âme atteindra son expression la plus exaltée et la plus parfaite : celle d'une arme.

languages.text: 前路漫漫多艰险，我们必须振作起来，迎接挑战。行商浪人将与军务部的财务专家签署互助协议。这些杰出的战争理论家将监督重组行星制造工厂，用于生产武器和军事装备。在车床的钳口与合金大桶的中空腹地中，没有灵魂的塑钢将被打造成最高级、最完美的形态——武器。
languages.original_text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

traits.locale_text: 前路漫漫多艰险，我们必须振作起来，迎接挑战。行商浪人将与军务部的财务专家签署互助协议。这些杰出的战争理论家将监督重组行星制造工厂，用于生产武器和军事装备。在车床的钳口与合金大桶的中空腹地中，没有灵魂的塑钢将被打造成最高级、最完美的形态——武器。

languages.text: 大いなる試練が待ち受けている。それに立ち向かうために、気を引き締めなければならない。ローグトレーダーは、帝国兵務局のクエスターと相互援助協定を締結した。この卓越した戦争理論家たちは、この惑星の聖工場を兵器や軍事装備の生産に再利用するよう監督している。旋盤の顎と合金タンクの子宮の中で、魂なきプラスチールは、兵器という最高で最も完璧な形をとることになるのだ。
languages.original_text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

traits.locale_text: 大いなる試練が待ち受けている。それに立ち向かうために、気を引き締めなければならない。ローグトレーダーは、帝国兵務局のクエスターと相互援助協定を締結した。この卓越した戦争理論家たちは、この惑星の聖工場を兵器や軍事装備の生産に再利用するよう監督している。旋盤の顎と合金タンクの子宮の中で、魂なきプラスチールは、兵器という最高で最も完璧な形をとることになるのだ。

languages.text: Große Prüfungen stehen bevor, und wir müssen uns stählen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wird mit den Quästoren des Departmento Munitorum ein gegenseitiges Hilfsabkommen unterzeichnen. Diese herausragenden Theoretiker der Kriegsführung werden die Umrüstung der Manufactorien des Planeten für die Produktion von Waffen und militärischer Ausrüstung überwachen. In den Kiefern von Drehbänken und im Schoss von Legierungsfässern wird seelenloser Plaststahl die höchste und perfekteste Form annehmen, die einer Waffe.
languages.original_text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.

traits.locale_text: Große Prüfungen stehen bevor, und wir müssen uns stählen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wird mit den Quästoren des Departmento Munitorum ein gegenseitiges Hilfsabkommen unterzeichnen. Diese herausragenden Theoretiker der Kriegsführung werden die Umrüstung der Manufactorien des Planeten für die Produktion von Waffen und militärischer Ausrüstung überwachen. In den Kiefern von Drehbänken und im Schoss von Legierungsfässern wird seelenloser Plaststahl die höchste und perfekteste Form annehmen, die einer Waffe.

languages.text: Önümüzde zorlu imtihanlar var, bunlarla yüzleşmek için pusat kuşanmamız gerek. Hür Tacir, Departmento Munitorum'un müfettişleriyle karşılıklı bir yardım antlaşması imzalayacak. Bu seçkin harp kuramcıları, gezegenin manufaktorumlarını silah ve askerî ekipman üretimi için tertipleme işini teftiş edecek. Ruhsuz plasçelik, torna makinelerinin dişlerinde ve alaşım varillerinin rahimlerinde silah hâline getirilerek en yüce ve kusursuz şekline bürünecek.
languages.original_text: Great trials are ahead, and we must steel ourselves to face them. The Rogue Trader will sign a mutual aid agreement with the quaestors of the Departmento Munitorum. These outstanding theoreticians of warfare will supervise the repurposing of the planet's manufactorums for the production of weapons and military equipment. In the jaws of lathe machines and the wombs of alloy vats, soulless plasteel will take on its highest and most perfect form, that of a weapon.
